item.description:
OK - Simple: Climb then explore the Somerville bar and music scene after. Meet at Metro rock at 6:30 PM - or later if need be - then go out for drinks later.
Meet in front of Johnny D's (17 Holland St. Somerville) at 10:30-10:45 You don't have to climb to join us! We will catch some music then bounce to another part of Somerville or Cambridge.
To keep up with us call my cell phone 617 501-6217

Geoff

(Look up MetroRock's web site if you are new to climbing.)
item.name: Friday - Climb then drinks later.
